high_descs: Go straight, turn left and make a turn right towards the desk lamp
Pick up pencil from the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: Picking up pencil from the table

high_descs: Turn around and go near the desk lamp.
Take the pencil from the desk.
anns.task_desc: Take the pencil from the desk.

high_descs: Head towards the couch to your left and then go to the desk lamp to your right.
Pick up the pencil on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Picking a pencil in the light of a desk lamp.
